programme.title: Oh My English! Musim Ke-2
programme.desc: Penggal baharu baru sahaja bermula di SMK Ayer Dalam. En. Henry Middleton telah mengubah fikirannya untuk tidak kembali ke UK. Dia ingin menyambung tugasnya di Kelas 3 Merah, dan belajar lebih mendalam tentang negara yang kini bergelar rumah baharunya. Dengan kehadiran guru kegemaran di sisi, Kelas 3 Merah kini bersedia meneruskan pembelajaran mereka dengan lebih ceria pada penggal baharu. Apakah yang berlaku apabila guru-guru dan pelajar-pelajar baharu seperti Cikgu Malik (Aaron Aziz), Cikgu Ayu (Tiz Zaqyah), Azlan (Syafie Naswip) serta Hani (Iezah Dyana), menyertai mereka ? Ikuti rancangan ini!

programme.title: Oga And Friends

programme.title: Oh My English! Musim Ke-2
programme.desc: Penggal baharu baru sahaja bermula di SMK Ayer Dalam. En. Henry Middleton telah mengubah fikirannya untuk tidak kembali ke UK. Dia ingin menyambung tugasnya di Kelas 3 Merah, dan belajar lebih mendalam tentang negara yang kini bergelar rumah baharunya. Dengan kehadiran guru kegemaran di sisi, Kelas 3 Merah kini bersedia meneruskan pembelajaran mereka dengan lebih ceria pada penggal baharu. Apakah yang berlaku apabila guru-guru dan pelajar-pelajar baharu seperti Cikgu Malik (Aaron Aziz), Cikgu Ayu (Tiz Zaqyah), Azlan (Syafie Naswip) serta Hani (Iezah Dyana), menyertai mereka ? Ikuti rancangan ini!

programme.title: Oh My English! Musim Ke-2
programme.desc: Penggal baharu baru sahaja bermula di SMK Ayer Dalam. En. Henry Middleton telah mengubah fikirannya untuk tidak kembali ke UK. Dia ingin menyambung tugasnya di Kelas 3 Merah, dan belajar lebih mendalam tentang negara yang kini bergelar rumah baharunya. Dengan kehadiran guru kegemaran di sisi, Kelas 3 Merah kini bersedia meneruskan pembelajaran mereka dengan lebih ceria pada penggal baharu. Apakah yang berlaku apabila guru-guru dan pelajar-pelajar baharu seperti Cikgu Malik (Aaron Aziz), Cikgu Ayu (Tiz Zaqyah), Azlan (Syafie Naswip) serta Hani (Iezah Dyana), menyertai mereka ? Ikuti rancangan ini!

programme.title: Rally for Love
programme.desc: The story starts with Malaysian badminton player Tang Jia Jie, who travel to Taiwan in search of the famous coach Xue Zhong Yong, who abandoned his mother, in an attempt to avenge her. programme.title: Hua Hee Buddies
programme.desc: Four old friends bridge the gap between the human world And spirit realm when they reunite under unusual circumstances. When Nana, a single lady, moves back to her old apartment, she is saved from by three spirits when she nearly drowns in a pool. To rid herself of them, she is forced to help them settle their unfinished business. Along the way, she becomes involved in a series of mysteries.

programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: Meekah
programme.desc: The world is full of amazing things to learn! Meekah explores the science of our planet and learns about the importance of being healthy and strong.

programme.title: Blippi
programme.desc: How does a recycling truck work? What happens on a farm? Will this object Sink or Float? Blippi explores the world around us with silly dance moves, fun songs, and awesome adventures. There is so much to learn about, it will make you want to shout BLIPPI!

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Join Baby John for a day full of fun and surprises! From playing with his siblings to going on an adventure, every moment is exciting.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Its Little Angel! Where baby John, his brother, Jack, and sister, Jill inspire kids and families to have fun and to grow and learn through play. Come sing along!

programme.title: Air Asia Buds Adventures
programme.desc: Its time for a high-flying adventure with the Air Asia Buds! Join them as they explore a busy fire station, visit a fun-filled farm, and learn all about amazing animals. Their journey takes them to incredible destinations around the world, from the vibrant streets of Bangkok and the beautiful beaches of the Philippines to the bustling city of Kuala Lumpur. Its a non-stop trip full of fun, learning, and discovery.

programme.title: VeeFriends
programme.desc: The VeeFriends are ready for some friendly competition! The action starts with an exciting egg and spoon race that tests everyones balance and speed. The challenges continue with an intense staring contest, a hilarious water balloon fight, and a strategic game of hide-and-seek. From bubble-blowing contests to seeing who can be the quietest, its a day packed with fun-filled battles where the only goal is to have a great time with friends.

programme.title: Antiks
programme.desc: When youre a middle child in a colony of thousands, getting lost in a crowd is all too easy. And if theres one thing Joey and Boo know all too well, its how to get lost and make it look easy! Every day their insatiable curiosity sends them on a journey into the great unknown, where they must make sense of the big wide world at a grass-roots level. Antiks tosses kids comedy deep into the undergrowth: its colorful, fun, and just a little dangerous.

programme.title: Antiks
programme.desc: The Antiks quest for treats is a wild ride! They must dodge fly swatters, escape sticky situations, and outsmart rivals to win their prize.

programme.title: Blippi

programme.title: Meekah
programme.desc: Meekah is on a magical adventure! She explores a mysterious castle and then meets a real-life mermaid in this enchanting tale.

programme.title: Meekah
programme.desc: Meekahs big adventure takes her to the ocean, where she meets a giant, friendly whale and learns all about the amazing creatures of the deep.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Army commando-robot ARPO has been assigned his toughest mission yet: babysitter! With a built-in radar system that scans for danger and an arsenal of baby gear set to deploy at a moments notice, ARPO is programmed to protect. As simple tasks like bath time, feeding, taking a nap, and changing diapers somehow turn into action-packed adventures thanks to Dannys curiosity, ARPO has his work cut out for him.

programme.title: Oddbods

programme.title: Oddbods
programme.desc: A fortune tellers curse seems to come true for Jeff, while Bubbles intelligence experiment on a guinea pig creates a super-genius.

programme.title: T-Rex Ranch
programme.desc: New Ranger Naomis first day gets chaotic when a pterodactyl steals her work, and things get worse when Ranger Darren accidentally burns the dino food.

programme.title: T-Rex Ranch
programme.desc: T-Rex Ranch brings you another awesome fun-packed collection of Jurassic dinosaur videos ! Watch your favorite park rangers get into all sorts of wonderful adventures, coming across lots of scary dinosaurs, awesome toys and much more!

programme.title: T-Rex Ranch
programme.desc: After testing out a new Dino Translator gadget, the ranchers must save the day when an intruder uses a shrink ray to make all the dinosaurs tiny.

programme.title: Blippis Top 10
programme.desc: Its an adventurous kind of day for Blippi as he remembers his top ten favorite moments at Amusement and Water Parks! Join Blippi as he rides on spinning tea cups, goes on roller coasters, slides down water slides and even learns about under water safety.

programme.title: Blippis Top 10
programme.desc: Time for some indoor fun! Blippi is sharing his top 10 favorite visits to amazing indoor playgrounds. Relive the excitement as he explores giant play structures, jumps in colorful ball pits, and zips down super-fast slides. Its a high-energy collection of his most memorable indoor adventures.

programme.title: Blippis Top 10
programme.desc: Blippi watches along to clips of his top 10 favorite ANIMAL episodes! He meets new animal friends like cheetahs, reindeer, and even sting rays and gets to play and feed some of them, too! Count down with him to number 1!

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Umai dan Icha masih cuba untuk memahami Oya yang kelihatan sentiasa memberontak. Pian risau kerana orang yang selalu membulinya di masa lalu kini muncul kembali.

programme.title: Cik Misi 123
programme.desc: Rakan-rakan Oya sengana membiarkan Oya dan Mika bersendirian dengan harapan mereka berdua dapat berbaik semula. Namun niat mereka itu disalah anggap oleh Oya.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Ainnura akhirnya bersedia untuk berkahwin dengan Fariz untuk kali kedua tetapi memberi syarat supaya Rohana sendiri yang meminangnya. Fariz juga tidak dibenarkan mempersoalkan siapa Fawwaz yang sebenarnya kerana Fawwaz bukan anak kandung Fariz sebagaimana yang disangkakan oleh Fariz. Beberapa hari sebelum pernikahan Ainnura dan Fariz, Tok Wan meninggal dunia akibat terjatuh di bilik air.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Selepas kematian Tok Wan, Ilah berhasrat untuk membatalkan perkahwinan Ainnura dengan Fariz. Bagaimanapun Ainnura bertegas untuk meneruskan rancangan mereka kerana itu juga yang dimahukan oleh Tok Wan demi meliah keluarga Ainnura dan keluarga Fariz berdamai. Rohana menyokong keputusan Ainnura dan ini menyebabkan Ilah kecil hati dengan Ainnura. Ilah akhirnya tidak hadir pada hari perkahwinan Ainnura.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Sikap prihatin dan baik Rohana terhadap Ainnura akhirnya terbongkar apabila tujuan Rohana merestui hasrat Fariz untuk megahwini Ainnura hanyalah semata-mata untuk membalas dendam pada Ainnura. Rohana paksa Ainnura tinggal bersamanya dan jika Ainnura menujuk Fariz supaya keluar dari rumah tersebut, dia tidak halal susu yang diminum oleh Fariz serta menganggap Fariz anak derhaka. Sementara itu, dalam diam Ilah sebenarnya merindui Ainnura.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Rohana sengaja menyeksa fizikal dan mental Ainnura. Fazira melihat apa yang dilakukan oleh Rohana terhadap Ainnura lalu mendesak Ainnura dan Fariz keluar dari rumah tersebut. Bagaimanapun Ainnura enggan kerana tidak mahu Fariz dianggap sebagai anak derhaka. Gara-hara terlalu marah dengan Ainnura, Rohana telah menghentak kepala Ainnura ke dinding. Fariz perasan dengan bengkak di kepala Ainnura.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Ainnura berbohong dengan Fariz yang bengkak di kepalanya akiat terhantuk pada sinki. Dalam waktu yang sama, Rohana mendakwa Ainnura sengaja menolaknya sehinggakan dia hampir terjatuh. Fateha menyokong kata-kata Rohana, menyebabkan Fariz keliru siapakah yang benar di antara isteri dan ibunya. Ainnura bangkit mempertahankan haknya. Selain daripada Ainnura, Fawwaz turut menjadi mangsa Rohana dan Fateha dengan pelbagai penghinaan sehingga akhirnya kerana tidak sanggup melihat Fawwaz dihina, Fazira mengakui yang Fawwaz adalah anaknya.

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Fateha dan Rohana terkejut apabila mengetahui Fawwaz adalah anak Fazira hasil hubungan terlarang dengan Raja Azali iaitu kekasih Fateha. Pada mulanya mereka tidak percaya tetapi ketika mereka hendak mendapatkan penjelasan daripada Raja Azali, Raja Azali telah ditangkap polis atas beberapa tuduhan merogol. Fariz meminta maaf di atas sikap Rohana selama ini. Ainnura telah lama memaafkan Rohana tetapi mahu Fariz menceraikannya kerana dia tidak mahu Fariz menjadi anak derhaka gara-garanya. Rohana terharu dengan sikap baik Ainnura dan merayu kemaafan daripada Ainnura.

programme.title: Sayang Papa Saya Tak
programme.desc: Farish who has just lost his wife is married to his sons caretaker, Raisya. Did they manage to keep their tested relationship strong even though they have to go through various obstacles?

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: After dispersing to different places, six of them drifted apart from their youthful agreement. However, through the experience of separation and reunion, they rediscovered their original aspirations.

programme.title: The Last Cook
programme.desc: In the late Qing era, commoner Ronger becomes a palace maid, where she taken in as a disciple. When her master is framed by a eunuch, she teams up with a guard to clear her masters name.

programme.title: Cubit - Cubit Cinta
programme.desc: Kupid Cubit is a dating app that enables the masses to find love. But for Katarina and Saiful, its a platform for healing people with unrequited love.

programme.title: Duit Kawin
programme.desc: Memaparkan pemikiran remaja sekarang terhadap perkahwinan dari sudut kos atas syariat agama tetapi tertekan cara hidup zaman kini yang mahukan kemewahan.

programme.title: Biarkan Cinta Tersenyum Lagi
programme.desc: Kisah penulis lagu Maya Arisa yang menghidap tumor otak dan mengimpikan untuk berkahwin. Dia kemudiannya bertemu dengan seorang jurugambar bernama Redza.

programme.title: Ayat Dari Langit
programme.desc: Ustaz Muiz dan isterinya mengajar ajaran sesat dan mahu pengikutnya mengikut telunjuk mereka yang lama kelamaan mula membuatkan pengikutnya bernama Kamal mula merasa sangsi.

programme.title: Cinta Round 1
programme.desc: Farid is a nerdy guy who always been bullied by Syakirin, his senior. Farid determined to enter an MMA tournament organized by their university so to put an end to being bullied by Syakirin.

programme.title: Racun Suami Jahanam
programme.desc: Suraya is a naive village girl who looks forward to happy days when Hazrul proposes to her. But those happy days are only temporary when she learns who Hazrul really is.

programme.title: 6 Hari
programme.desc: Suzi is content with being a third wife and living alone in her bungalow as she only entertains her husband every 6 days. Everything comes crashing when a person from her past returns to her life.

programme.title: Please Subscribe Cintaku
programme.desc: Hannah and her friend Alia have gone to an abandoned construction site to find material for her YouTube channel, but she unknowingly records a murder.

programme.title: Diva Dari Jakarta
programme.desc: Erin dan Ejot sering dibandingkan dari segi paras rupa. Sehingga suatu hari sesuatu telah berlaku kepada Erin yang mengubah segalanya.

programme.title: Diam Tanda Setuju
programme.desc: Kisah dua sahabat baik yang berhadapan dengan konflik perhubungan di saat mereka mula panik memikirkan usia mereka yang semakin meningkat tetapi belum bertemu jodoh.

programme.title: Nasiya
programme.desc: Ketika melarikan diri dari bekas suaminya, Ihyana telah mengalami kemalangan tetapi dia bernasib baik kerana telah diselamatkan oleh satu entiti luar biasa yang telah mengubah kelakuannya.

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Suamiku Encik Beruang
programme.desc: Ani, the most beautiful girl in the village, who is ever mans fantasy, decides to marry Mr. Bear as her husband, much to everyones surprise. As for the chief village, he intend to organise the wedding of the year.

programme.title: Menanti Hari Itu
programme.desc: Kisah kasih sayang seorang ibu terhadap anak kandungnya yang tidak pernah terpadam meskipun si anak menjauhkan diri akibat hasutan keluarga angkatnya sendiri.

programme.title: Kecundang Sebelum Menjanda
programme.desc: Hari terbahagia dalam hidup Nora berubah menjadi suram bila tunangnya menarik diri pada hari pernikahan mereka. Tambah buruk lagi, hari selepas tragedi itu asyik berulang atas sebab-sebab misteri.

programme.title: Aku Raja Lawak
programme.desc: Silah nak jadi pelawak yang terkenal, cuma di kampungnya tak ada peluang pekerjaan pelawak sepenuh masa. Tapi dia tetap mendapat sokongan padu daripada peminat nombor satunya iaitu Faris, anaknya.

programme.title: Bayangan Emilia
programme.desc: Rita berpindah masuk ke banglo Ungku Mahmud dan mula merasai akan kehadiran roh yang seperti tidak senang dengan kehadirannya disitu. Apakah misteri di sebalik rumah banglo tersebut?

programme.title: Oh Speak English Please
programme.desc: Kisah Sally anak remaja moden yang merasa malu dengan ibunya kerana tidak pandai berbahasa Inggeris dan berketrampilan agak kekampungan. Lakonan Rozita Che Wan dan Zahirah MacWilson.

programme.title: Striker Hati Ayah
programme.desc: Sofia susah untuk memilih antara dua calon, Raf atau Noah. Lalu meminta pendapat ayahnya, Adam. Kini dua lelaki tersebut terpaksa memenangi hati ayah Sofia, seorang peminat fanatik bola.

programme.title: Gebu Gebu Manis
programme.desc: Kisah Hamdi dan Dolah yang memulakan perniagaan dodol tetapi sering disabotaj oleh Amira yang cemburu dengan perniagaan dua orang sahabat ini.

programme.title: Perangkap Perkahwinan
programme.desc: Three best friends promised to get married, at the same time when they turn 26 years old. Their perceptions of marriage life begin to change and conflict ensues.

programme.title: Cik Puan Sinderella
programme.desc: This is a lighthearted family drama about a teenage girl who is closely guarded by her mother.

programme.title: Anak Kerak
programme.desc: Husin telah menggunakan ilmu hitam iaitu dengan Anak Kerak demi untuk mendapatkan kekebalan, kesenangan dan kemewahan hidup di dunia

programme.title: Jatuh Cinta Buta
programme.desc: Telefilem komedi romantik tentang perkenalan singkat di antara Zulin, seorang gadis yang tidak pernah bercinta, dengan Izlan, seorang duda dalam satu blind date yang diaturkan oleh Nadya Ramanshah.

programme.title: Matahari
programme.desc: Fauzi seorang guru yang telah dihantar untuk berkhidmat di Sabah. Di sana dia telah berkenalan dengan seorang novelis yang sedang mengalami masalah writers block iaitu Yazid.

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Meniti Cinta Di Starimost
programme.desc: Iman dipaksa berkahwin dengan Qaseh, anak kepada orang gajinya untuk mewarisi harta bapanya. Percutian mereka di Bosnia membuahkan bibit-bibit cinta. Lakonan Iqram Dinzly, Zarina Zainoordin dan Yana Shamsudin.

programme.title: Jula Juli Bintang Putus Cinta
programme.desc: Telemovie sekuel Jula Juli Bintang Cinta kini kembali! Kali ini, Jula dan Juli mengalami konflik percintaan dengan Dani And Izham sehingga mereka memutuskan untuk berpisah dan melarikan diri ke kampung Juli.

programme.title: Kampung Kuala Lambat
programme.desc: Kampung Kuala Lambat bagai mengalami sumpahan apabila lelaki yang berkahwin muda akan mati di hari pernikahan mereka namun kejadian ganjil ini tidak berlaku kepada lelaki yang berusia 60 tahun ke atas.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: An international news bulletin, presented live from the newsroom.

programme.title: A Tale Of Two Guns
programme.desc: A deputized gunslinger takes up the call to hunt down the last Cowboy, the chase is on and the bullets fly and only one of these hardened men can survive.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Hayes Hodges, an attorney, takes up the offer of defending his friend Colonel Terry Childers, accused of ordering his squad to open fire on a group of demonstrators.

programme.title: Johnny And Clyde
programme.desc: Johnny and Clyde are two serial killers who are on an endless crime spree. They decide to assemble a group of criminals and misfits to steal from Alanas casino and pull off the heist of the century.

programme.title: Operation Sea Wolf
programme.desc: The German Navy and the last remaining U-Boats, were formed together for one last mission to attack the United States Homeland.

programme.title: Centigrade
programme.desc: A married couple find themselves trapped in their frozen vehicle after a blizzard and struggle to survive amid plunging temperatures and unforeseen obstacles.

programme.title: Enter The Clones of Bruce
programme.desc: Enter the Clones of Bruce dives into the Bruce Lee exploitation craze, otherwise known as Bruceploitation.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: A Las Vegas casino magnate, determined to find a new avenue for wagering, sets up a race for money.

programme.title: Chosen
programme.desc: The Jews of Eastern Europe are being massacred by the thousands. Galvanised into action after the death of his wife, Hungarian barrister Sonson finds himself leading an inspirational fight back against the increasingly desperate and dangerous Nazis.

programme.title: Escape Through Africa
programme.desc: Following a violent raid on her outpost, a British nurse, Anne is on the run with a small group of soldiers. She must balance bravery with compassion to save a native girl, her husband, and her colony.

programme.title: Hunting Games
programme.desc: Two dangerous armed men must hunt each other and fight to death over millions of dollars in cash in this high octane wilderness survival story.

programme.title: Blowback
programme.desc: After planning a perfect heist, Nick is ready to score. One problem, his girl and the crew, have other ideas. They take Nick down in a hail of bullets but Nick doesnt die and in a race for his life, seeks revenge one target at a time.

programme.title: Override
programme.desc: In 2040, a female humanoid A.I. is hacked by her husband and forced to kidnap the U.S. vice presidents son and execute him on live television.

programme.title: Hideout
programme.desc: Evading police at a remote farmhouse after fumbling a robbery, four criminals discover that the family living there is not who they appear to be.

programme.title: Project Legion
programme.desc: A young man trapped in his apartment with a swarm of demons outside his door must find a way to survive the night and escape from apartment 213.

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: Max and Page, a brilliant mother-daughter swindler team, target the citys wealthiest men. Max marries them and then sues for alimony after she catches them involved in an affair with Page.

programme.title: The Commando
programme.desc: A DEA agent returns home with PTSD after a botched mission and must now protect his family from a home invasion when a recently freed convict and his henchmen come after their stash of millions hidden inside of the agents home.

programme.title: The Competition
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: The Legion
programme.desc: Noreno, a half-Roman, is entrusted with the mission of crossing the snowy mountains of Armenia, swarming with Parthian patrols, to seek help for his slowly dying men.

programme.title: Come Out Fighting
programme.desc: During WWII, the American army have raced their way through the countryside on the border of France entering Nazi Germany. Hitler has deployed his secret weapon. Lieutenant Frank Ross encounters the Nazi weapon and an intense aerial battle ensues.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - A Song To Kill For
programme.desc: Max Mayfair has it all; a beautiful girlfriend, Ava, a new London crime family, and thanks to his latest heist, a priceless diamond necklace. However, when mafioso Calbones henchmen catch up with Mike and Armen, determined to drag them back to New York to pay for their crimes, Max has everything to lose. Teaming up with his old friend, Marseille Mafia crime boss, Paul, Max hatches a plan to lure the New York Mafia to Mayfair.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - Serenas Game
programme.desc: Refusing to comply with Tommys demands, Max and Paul conspire to have the British gangster eliminated and Serena arrested. With Tommy dead and Serena in handcuffs, it appears as though Max has succeeded. His plan goes awry, however, when MI6 force Max to help Serena bring down her employers: the Russian mob. Torn between a life of crime with Serena or happiness with Ava, nothing is ever simple in the life of Max Mayfair.

programme.title: Altitude
programme.desc: A female FBI agent is offered millions to help a thief escape from a hijacked airplane.

programme.title: In Isolation
programme.desc: Four friends wanted to get away from it all in a remote country house but when a mysterious injured man turns up on their doorstep telling tales of a city ravaged by a epidemic and the looters who have pursued him, the friends rally to help.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - The Spyce Of Life
programme.desc: Returning from a romantic getaway with Ava, Max finds himself on the wrong side of the law yet again. Now blackmailed by MI6, Max must spy on two suspected terrorists; Aziz and Omar, who are regular customers at his club. Accompanied by his London crime family, Max breaks into Omars country estate and discovers his sinister plan. With everything on the line, Max must race to uncover a highly skilled hackers identity before its too late.

programme.title: Any Bullet Will Do
programme.desc: Two Brothers find themselves on opposing sides of the fight as one hopes to help abolish slavery while the other believes it is his God-given right.

programme.title: Come Out Fighting
programme.desc: During WWII, the American army have raced their way through the countryside on the border of France entering Nazi Germany. Hitler has deployed his secret weapon. Lieutenant Frank Ross encounters the Nazi weapon and an intense aerial battle ensues.

programme.title: Chosen Family
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: Enter The Clones of Bruce
programme.desc: Enter the Clones of Bruce dives into the Bruce Lee exploitation craze, otherwise known as Bruceploitation.

programme.title: Up with the Gods / Himalayan Tahr
programme.desc: After being dropped off into the mountains where there were only whispers and tales of mountain monsters being seen. Mario is on the search of the outer limits of the mountains to find himself a monster red deer. His arrow successfully finds a big red and he showcases some recipes he learnt from the southern regions of Italy form leading celebrity chefs. But not before a mammoth carry out through the back country of the Deep South.

programme.title: Outback Odyssey / Arabian Camel
programme.desc: Mario teams up with good friend and precision rifle expert Bernard and heads into the high alpine mountains above New Zealnds rugged West Coast in search of tahr. Drawing on his Greek roots, Mario cooks a rustic Kleftiko dish in an earth oven.

programme.title: Firearm Opener
programme.desc: November 15 is Michigans firearm opener each year and is like Christmas for many hunters and Conservation Officers alike.

programme.title: Snowmobiles and Oktoberfest
programme.desc: Michigan Conservation Officers patrol a weekend party and make sure snowmobilers are riding safely.

programme.title: HEAD START
programme.desc: Funding her mining season alone and determined to start her hunt for jade a month early, Claudia is forced to re-think her strategy when snow and high water stops the crew in their tracks.

programme.title: HARD CORE
programme.desc: Robin follows a hunch to a new site at an old claim, while Joshs high expectations and short fuse test Garys patience.

programme.title: TIP OF THE ICEBERG
programme.desc: Guy struggles with the excavator to expose a massive find while Joshs dissatisfaction with his position in the crew causes family conflicts to boil over.

programme.title: YOURE MY BOY BLUE
programme.desc: The crew faces a dangerous recovery on the banks above the Turnagain River. Guy and Gary continue to stumble over jade at Dynasty while Josh searches around Jade City for his missing dog.

programme.title: UPHILL BATTLE
programme.desc: Cutting a potential million-dollar find is put on hold when old equipment fails, but a new saw could reveal an unexpected windfall from a decades-old family heirloom.

programme.title: ALL SLICE, NO DICE
programme.desc: Cutting finally starts on the giant jade lens at Dynasty, but big fractures slice of the lens. The Jade City community is on edge when two trucks roll over on the same stretch of highway.

programme.title: SLIPPING AWAY
programme.desc: Downpours threaten the crews safety and shut down mining at Pit 3. Josh gets a chance to prove himself on the excavator, but a breakdown tests his patience.

programme.title: FAILING GRADE
programme.desc: When an important jade buyer isnt impressed with the Pit 3 lens, Claudia is forced to make a difficult decision that disappoints her crew.

programme.title: MOVING DAY
programme.desc: The race to pack up camp at Wolverine becomes a nightmare when heat, sickness and a forest fire descend on the crew.

programme.title: BATTERED AND BRUISED
programme.desc: The brutal trek to a new mine site separates the family and pushes Josh to his breaking point. Scrappy Larry struggles to keep his extra wide army truck on the steep and narrow road.

programme.title: THE CURSE OF WOLVERINE
programme.desc: Claudia is chomping at the bit to break ground on the new site, but progress is stalled by a series of unlucky incidents at their old mining camp, Wolverine.

programme.title: SHOWER DAY
programme.desc: Small luxuries in camp cheer up a disgruntled crew, and surprise visitors raise Claudias hopes for her future at 2 Mile.

programme.title: MEDIO-CORE
programme.desc: Gary and Josh fail to return from a routine fuel run, and drill cores cast doubt over the quality of jade lenses at 2 Mile.

programme.title: WE FOUND JADE
programme.desc: The crew finally hits it big, but with winter descending, Claudia worries that the big find may have come too late.

programme.desc: Recently, Laila and Suri lost their father. They were shocked with the presence of a saka, Jamal. Jamal follows them wherever they go. As long as they live, Jamal belongs to them.

Laila and Suri have never been closed before but because of Jamal, they must work together. Taqriz advises them to accept Jamal as he is, and grants him whatever he likes. As long as they live, Jamal belongs to them.

programme.title: Airborne
programme.desc: Watch beginners make their first leap into the air, like an Andean condor who must attend flight school before spreading its wings. Meet oddballs who soar without feathers and marvel at a peregrine falcons speed as it dives to catch its prey.

programme.title: Airborne
programme.desc: Go hunting with flyers who excel at making mid-air catches. Watch the metamorphosis of the acrobatic emperor dragonfly, admire the barn owls stealthy approach to prey, and catch a wandering salamanders death-defying leap into the abyss.

programme.desc: Little Baby Bum follows the musical adventures of Mia, Twinkle the Star and Baby Max. Everyday moments like bath time, getting dressed, or playing peekaboo become even more fun with new and classic nursery rhymes.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Get ready to sing along with all your favorite friends! When Miss Pollys dolly gets sick, Twinkle and Mummy are there to help. The family takes a sleepy bus ride home and the kids learn to be nimble and brave at the ball pit. They make their own instruments, learn about colors and have a fun day at the farm. Its a day of music, learning and fun!

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: Come along on fun adventures as Blippi journeys off in his BlippiMobile to answer burning questions such as How does a rainbow get its colors? and why is Blippis popsicle melting?. Luckily he has his faithful sidekicks TABBS and D.BO to help him find the answers.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: Get ready for some thrilling adventures with Blippi Wonders! This journey is packed with excitement and learning. Discover how a firetruck and a police car work, learn about the sticky science of glue, and see the amazing power of magnets. Its a fun-filled exploration of the amazing things that make our world work.

programme.title: Go Buster: Specials
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve, but Santa has an accident and wont be able to fly his sleigh. So he calls in his old friend Jada and with the help of Buster the Bus, they can still save Christmas and make sure everyone gets their presents on time. Its a race against time, but Buster is up for the challenge!

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Buster is a cute and cheeky little bus with an adventurous spirit and an inquisitive mind. More than anything else, he loves exploring his high-tech hometown Wheelieville, riding into adventures both big and small with his vehicle friends The Bumper Bunch.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Geckos Garage is the repair shop that cares. Run by cheerful mechanic Gecko and his trusty robot sidekicks, The Mechanicals, the garage takes care of all the vehicles in town and keeps them running smoothly. Whether its fixing a flat tyre, stopping a rocket-powered ice cream truck, or rescuing a vehicle thats stuck in the mud, Gecko is always on hand to help with a friendly smile and a can-do attitude!

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Baby Truck is always ready for an adventure, and today hes leading his friends on an exciting exploration! Their playtime takes a messy turn when Baby Trucks curiosity gets the better of him, and he ends up stuck deep in the mud. It looks like hes in real trouble, but his friends wont leave him behind. This is a wonderful tale of how the smallest heroes, working together as a team, can solve even the stickiest of problems.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Theres a new sheriff in town! What could be more fun than going to the Old West Planet to play REAL cowboys? Unfortunately, Ema gets a little carried away in her new role as sheriff. After their western adventure, the crew heads to the Beach Planet and encounters a hermit crab that has lost its shell!

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Emas got the blues and her friends want to help! They decide to take her to the Happy Planet to cheer her up. Ema is also trying to learn how to ride a bike but is too scared to try. The gang takes her to the Bike Planet to find the perfect, non-scary ride for her.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Army commando-robot ARPO has been assigned his toughest mission yet: babysitter! With a built-in radar system that scans for danger and an arsenal of baby gear set to deploy at a moments notice, ARPO is programmed to protect. As simple tasks like bath time, feeding, taking a nap, and changing diapers somehow turn into action-packed adventures thanks to Dannys curiosity, ARPO has his work cut out for him.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: Its a day of city-wide chaos as Mila and Morphle are on a mission to find the Mayors lost dog, Barky! With Morphle morphed into a super search-dog, they follow the trail. But their heroic search is interrupted when they must also deal with the naughty Fruit Bandits, who are causing mayhem across town. Its a hectic adventure of tracking clues and stopping troublemakers to restore peace and bring Barky home.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: My Magic Pet Morphle follows the adventures of Mila and her magical morphing pet, Morphle. programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready to build a Snowbod! Pogo wants to show Lulu how fun snow can be, so they build a snowman together, but the sun comes out and starts to melt it! Lulu reads a story about a magical Snowhoof and sets off to find it in real life. On the ice, Fuse gets impatient when Jeff cant learn how to skate as quickly as the others.

programme.title: KiiYii
programme.desc: Get ready for playtime with Kii and Yii! The friends play the floor is lava when a toy volcano erupts. They have a bunny hop hopscotch race and play with a life-sized marble run. They play a fun game of Simon Says, have a jump rope race and get stuck in the mud. Plus, they have a pool party, play capture the flag and have fun in a giant ball pit.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Get ready for bed with these sweet bedtime songs. Learn the difference between big and small with Mia and Daddy. Watch Itsy Bitsy Spider try to climb up the waterspout. When Mia gets frustrated, her mummy teaches her a calming counting song. Twinkle the star helps all her friends fall asleep and Baby Panda learns that playing in the rain can be fun.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Get ready for some sweet evening songs. Daddy helps Max get ready for bed with a bath and a story. The family goes to the supermarket and on the way, they practice waving hello and goodbye. Mia and Max count all the buses they see on the way to school. The family learns about what to wear in any weather and Daddy makes fun shadow puppets on the wall.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum: Lullabies
programme.desc: Little Baby Bum is here to help you fall to sleep with soothing, relaxing animated lullabies. These gentle and sensory videos are accompanied by lullaby versions of much-loved nursery rhymes, helping to take you to the land of nod.

Run by cheerful mechanic Gecko and his trusty robot sidekicks, The Mechanicals, the garage takes care of all the vehicles in town and keeps them running smoothly. Whether its fixing a flat tyre, stopping a rocket-powered ice cream truck, or rescuing a vehicle thats stuck in the mud, Gecko is always on hand to help with a friendly smile and a can-do attitude!

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Army commando-robot ARPO has been assigned his toughest mission yet: babysitter! With a built-in radar system that scans for danger and an arsenal of baby gear set to deploy at a moments notice, ARPO is programmed to protect. As simple tasks like bath time, feeding, taking a nap, and changing diapers somehow turn into action-packed adventures thanks to Dannys curiosity, ARPO has his work cut out for him.

programme.title: Go Buster: Specials
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve, but Santa has an accident and wont be able to fly his sleigh. So he calls in his old friend Jada and with the help of Buster the Bus, they can still save Christmas and make sure everyone gets their presents on time. Its a race against time, but Buster is up for the challenge!

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Buster is a cute and cheeky little bus with an adventurous spirit and an inquisitive mind. More than anything else, he loves exploring his high-tech hometown Wheelieville, riding into adventures both big and small with his vehicle friends The Bumper Bunch.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Welcome to the fantastical planet of Bod, home to the Minibods. Join six furry baby friends as they get up to hilarious mayhem, turning everyday situations into unexpected, super silly events. Whatever life throws their way, the Minibods overcome hurdles the unconventional way, to better understand themselves and the world around them.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready for a teddy bear panic! Pogo accidentally ruins Newts special teddy bear-shaped hedge and isnt sure if he should tell the truth. Jeff has to overcome his fear of mud to get his favorite feather duster back. Bubbles wants to take a picture with a big purple star and builds a rocket to get to it. Pogo tries to surprise his friends with ice cream, but it keeps melting.

programme.title: Minibods

Join six furry baby friends as they get up to hilarious mayhem, turning everyday situations into unexpected, super silly events. Whatever life throws their way, the Minibods overcome hurdles the unconventional way, to better understand themselves and the world around them.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: A wave of monster truck madness is taking over Petport! The mischievous Orphle is using his magic to transform every vehicle he sees-from fire engines to ice cream vans-into giant, rumbling monster trucks. To stop the city-wide destruction and return things to normal, Morphle must morph into a series of powerful monster trucks himself and challenge his naughty twin in a high-octane showdown.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: My Magic Pet Morphle follows the adventures of Mila and her magical morphing pet, Morphle. Whether they need to stop a magic pet who doesnt know how to control their powers, the town Bandits from stealing things, or the mischievous Orphle from causing havoc, Mila and Morphle always work together to help out!

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Baby John needs to learn to be gentle! Hes a little too rough when he plays with Bingo, but his family teaches him how to be kind. He gets scared when he hears a fire truck siren for the first time, but his family shows him theres nothing to be afraid of. He has a playdate with Manny, refuses to take a nap and gets into some makeup. Plus, he becomes a detective to find out who took the cookie!

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep05 Kegembiraan Roz dapat menyelamatkan Rin terbantut apabila penculik Rin telah melepaskan diri daripada tahanan polis. Roz juga mengaitkan kes penculikan Rin dengan kes Dr Kaos Jr yang terlepas dari penjara dengan rancangan jahat yang lebih besar.

programme.title: #Tom Tom Bak Series
programme.desc: Datuk Aznil Haji Nawawi turun padang sempena pencarian bakat baru #TomTomBak. Ramai yang hadir untuk menonjolkan bakat yang mereka ada. Bermacam ragam And aksi lucu dapat kita saksikan. Anak-anak yang petah berborak juga turut dicari untuk musim terbaru ini.

programme.title: Geng Gajet
programme.desc: Aly dan geng di perkenalkan kepada Ramona, yang memerlukan bantuan mereka untuk merakam video untuknya, yang sebagai gantinya, berjanji akan membuat video promo untuk kedai ayah Aly

programme.title: Oh My English!
programme.desc: Di SMK Ayer Dalam, Kelas 3 Merah terkenal sebagai kelas yang mempunyai berbagai kerenah. Pelajar-pelajarnya nakal, suka buat bising. Subjek yang mereka paling tidak gemar ialah Bahasa Inggeris.

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt helps to save a badger knocked down by car but will it return to the wild? He relieves a cat with a particular problem and helps a farmer catch a runaway calf. Up at the Zoo he knocks out a polar bear and puts a Zebra back on her feet.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Alan Davies returns for a brand-new series of The Dog Rescuers and its going to be bigger and better than ever. On this weeks show, German Shepherd puppies covered in their own mess and eating raw meat off a filthy floor. They need Inspector Herchy Boals help to get them out of their concrete cage.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Samoyed dogs, known as smiling angels are in fact not easy to raise. They require enough love and dedication, especially extraordinary physical strength!!! For you to be happy and healthy with them.nIf you want to raise a Samoyed, or already own one, we hope you can give them the best care and love, and make them your best partners. Come and jot notes of the hard work and tears shared by expert owners :)!

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Weve got monkey criminals, magic and mirrors, cheeky monkeys, monkey pals, banana loving primates, baby monkeys, monkeys vs cameras, monkeys out on the town, and monkeys acting like us humans.

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Have A Pet Day
programme.desc: Renowned Golden Bell awarded host Sandy Wu takes her beloved dog Hershey on outings, inviting celebrities and their adorable pets to join in the fun. Beyond exploring nature, the show delves into heartfelt conversations about the journey of pet ownership and shares touching stories amid delightful scenery and cuisine. The program features various enjoyable activities where owners and pets can bond, creating unforgettable memories through laughter and tears.

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: At Flamingoland two lambs have worrying scabs in their mouths and Dr. Matt is concerned it could be infectious. He tries to help a family save their much-loved pet but the future looks bleak for Rosie the hen. Meanwhile another familys pet dog doesnt take too kindly to the attentions of a vet. And Aztec the Harris Hawk needs a spot of surgery.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: New popular pets of the dark world have all crawled out and gathered together?! Dark cuisines made from insects can also taste delicious?! Eye-opening! Cold and arrogant reptiles can be obedient?! Experts demonstrate how to take care of reptiles at home in person?! Surprise! All cute dark pets are present at a gathering of reptile friends?!

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: Dachshund, prince of the dog world and American pitbull, the gangster boss compete to see who is the cutest? There are many problems when taking your dog out for a walk, pet trainer teaches your dog to walk well in 3 steps! What are the precautions for daily care of dogs dog owners are most concerned about? programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: This week finds Dr. Matt grappling with wild cats, a juvenile delinquent donkey, too many male lemurs and a penguin with a eye problem.

programme.title: My House And Other Animals
programme.desc: Meet the modern-day Dr Doolittles with a passion for all creatures great and small: the unsung heroes of the wildlife world, whose homes have become havens for every animal imaginable.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Because of her love for cats, Claire carefully created a place called There is a Cat at the Corner. While enjoying your meals and drinks, more than a dozen beautiful cats are strolling freely in the store, waiting to interact with you up close and enjoy a slow life with you. However, if you want to pet the cat yourself and win their favor, you must first understand the nature and preferences of cats! Claire also generously shares her experiences in ruling over dozens of cats, which is extremely precious. Novice cat lovers should come and have a look!

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt tries to perk up Spike the iguana whos down in the dumps and he meets the latest fascinating additions to the aquarium the magical but very endangered seahorses. But he also faces every vets nightmare during an operation on a budgie.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Weve scoured the internet to bring you the most hilarious clips of Budgies (and other birds) on the planet, not so much -whos a clever boy- as -whos a funny boy-! Flying fails, performing Parrots and the real life angry birds -V weve assembled the very best the web has to offer, guaranteed to make you laugh out loud.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Brother Hui, who runs an amphibian and reptile store in Xinxing District, Kaohsiung City, has a wide range of knowledge in the field of reptiles. He started with red-eared sliders and gradually got in touch with tortoises, lizards, snakes and other reptile pets. In Brother Huis brick-and-mortar store, the most special existence is the two store pets, the South American lizards. The male is called Meatball and the female is called Porkball. How did their fate with Brother Hui begin? Brother Hui, who has many years of experience in raising South American lizards, also generously share his breeding secrets. How to distinguish male and female South American lizards? How to keep them healthy? Whats the secret to taming them? In this epsiode, we unpack the living environment of South American lizards and reveal the breeding guide!

programme.title: Smash Burgers And A Slice in Los Angeles

programme.title: Brooklyns Best Pizza Tour

programme.title: Loaded Dogs And Classic Cocktails in San Diego

programme.title: BBQ Bowls And Puffy Tacos in San Antonio
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza gets his spurs on to sample San Antonios best all-day brunch, taste some epic puffy tacos at a classic car joint, create colorful conchitas, and bask in the beauty of BBQ Thai curry bowls.

programme.title: Side Hustles
programme.desc: From a lawyer to an actor to an insurance analyst, Stephanie discovers a world of folks whove turned their passion for cooking into side hustle food businesses. From dumplings, sushi and pretzels she explores how they balance their day jobs.

programme.title: Comfort Foods
programme.desc: Latin-inspired ice cream to Caribbean, Channa curry doubles to gourmet, deli sandwiches; Stephanie Izard shows what comfort food means to 3 very different cooks and learns how they turned their childhood memories into thriving food businesses.

programme.title: Cooking with Fire
programme.desc: Stephanie meets 3 cooks who use fire in different ways to create distinct dishes. Using their love of cooking over an open flame; these cooks introduce her to the diverse flavors of Armenia; a classic Italian hero, and infrared grilled Brazilian BBQ

programme.title: Secret Pizza
programme.desc: With the help of a guide, Stephanie Izard explores the underground secret pizzas of Los Angeles, including an off-menu pizza at a cinnamon bun pop-up, apartment-cooked limited drop specials and gourmet sourdough pies made in pizza vans mobile oven.

programme.title: Life After Restaurants
programme.desc: From backyard mariscos to Cantonese remixes of British hand pies to made-to-order slap noodles, Stephanie catches hangs with 3 chefs who left the traditional restaurant scene and found alternative ways to cook for a living and make the food they love

programme.title: Farm Forward Cooking
programme.desc: From a chef creating dishes that combine her Mexican and Indigenous heritage to a pizza pop up that improvs with farmers market ingredients to a backyard-run Indigenous dinner series, Stephanie Izard meets cooks taking their lead from the land.

programme.title: Origins to Originals
programme.desc: From roast chicken to smash burgers to hot sauce, Stephanie Izard meets three different chefs putting their own California-inspired spin on food from their heritage by remixing traditional recipes that center local, fresh ingredients.

programme.title: Unique Eats
programme.desc: From a chef making Italian pasta with Mexican flavors to a groundbreaking functional cocktail bar to a couple that roasts whole goats behind a tire shop, Stephanie Izard finds unique eateries serving up one-of-a-kind food.

programme.title: Family Style
programme.desc: From brothers selling moms Syrian food to a Filipino family remixing a classic dessert to a mom and son running an Indian restaurant out of their house, Stephanie meets multi-gen families turning family recipes into smash hit food business.

programme.title: Home Cooking
programme.desc: From a homerun Greek dinner party series to a backyard thats become a gourmet deli to a Burmese pop up running out of an apartment kitchen, Stephanie Izard meets cooks finding ingenious ways to serve mouth-watering food out of their houses.

programme.title: Summer Fun
programme.desc: As summer heats up, the creators sweat it out in the kitchen putting an original spin on corn ribs and a transforming watermelon into a savory dish. Who will whip up this years hottest recipe?

programme.title: Dish in Disguise
programme.desc: The internet falls fast for snacks and hacks that look like one thing but taste like another. Creators must make donuts with anything but traditional batter, then flip the script on ramen, using it in an unconventional yet recognizable way.

programme.title: Make It or Bake It
programme.desc: Baking videos send our social media feeds in a frenzy and we cant seem to get enough. Watch as creators impress the judges with a show stopping focaccia, then pay tribute to the mini pancake cereal trend by concocting their own unique cereal.

programme.title: Chicken or the Egg
programme.desc: No matter which came first, neither one is leaving the internet anytime soon. Creators aim to reinvent two iconic viral recipes, starting with a jazzed up egg sandwich sensation, and then their most innovative bucket of fried chicken.

programme.title: Extra-delicious
programme.desc: They say go big or dont go at all. When it comes to some viral recipes, going all out is the method to internet madness. Creators customize a burrito made of homemade cotton candy, then shoot for the moon in an over the top nacho spread.

programme.title: Kids At Heart
programme.desc: Theres nothing more nostalgic than eating the good old meals from our childhood. Creators throw it back to some kid-friendly favorites, first with a personal rendition of the fried uncrustable, then with a three-course, microwave-only menu.

programme.title: Summer Fun
programme.desc: As summer heats up, the creators sweat it out in the kitchen putting an original spin on corn ribs and a transforming watermelon into a savory dish. Who will whip up this years hottest recipe?

programme.title: Dish in Disguise
programme.desc: The internet falls fast for snacks and hacks that look like one thing but taste like another. Creators must make donuts with anything but traditional batter, then flip the script on ramen, using it in an unconventional yet recognizable way.

programme.title: Kids At Heart
programme.desc: Theres nothing more nostalgic than eating the good old meals from our childhood. Creators throw it back to some kid-friendly favorites, first with a personal rendition of the fried uncrustable, then with a three-course, microwave-only menu.

programme.title: Summer Fun
programme.desc: As summer heats up, the creators sweat it out in the kitchen putting an original spin on corn ribs and a transforming watermelon into a savory dish. Who will whip up this years hottest recipe?

programme.title: Dish in Disguise
programme.desc: The internet falls fast for snacks and hacks that look like one thing but taste like another. Creators must make donuts with anything but traditional batter, then flip the script on ramen, using it in an unconventional yet recognizable way.

programme.title: Pierogies, Bagels, and Ramen in NYC
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza takes a LOT of bites out of the big apple as he samples warm pillowy bagels And schmear, grabs pierogies at an old school Ukrainian spot, gets the scoop on innovative ice cream flavors, and slurps up some real ramen.

programme.title: Tacos, Brats, And Biscuits in Austin
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes down south to try Austins best bets - breakfast tacos are on the itinerary, as well as a bangin beer garden And sausage house, loaded biscuits, and dessert pancakes to boot! Austin may be weird but the food is fabulous.

programme.title: Smash Burgers And A Slice in Los Angeles
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to all the buzzworthy spots in LA - cooking up calamari steak at a classic Mexican joint, tasting taro root donuts with fun flavors, grabbing a guanciale slice, and hopping on the line to make cheesy scrumptious smash burgers.

programme.title: Brooklyns Best Pizza Tour
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza goes on the best pizza party crawl that Brooklyn has to offer. Hell try a Neo-Neapolitan pie, a classic coal oven favorite, hell hit up a modern joint with innovative toppings, and a cozy Italian-owned neighborhood spot.

programme.title: Loaded Dogs And Classic Cocktails in San Diego
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to San Diego to sample a modern spin on classic deli fare, heavily loaded low-riding hot dogs, frosty And fruity Taiwanese snow ice, and fancy French cocktails from a rotating carousel bar.

programme.title: BBQ Bowls And Puffy Tacos in San Antonio
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza gets his spurs on to sample San Antonios best all-day brunch, taste some epic puffy tacos at a classic car joint, create colorful conchitas, and bask in the beauty of BBQ Thai curry bowls.

programme.title: Taste Selebriti
programme.desc: A food-travelogue program where 13 local celebrities will return to their hometowns to share traditional cuisines, unique foods and popular dishes in their states.

programme.title: Travel Lawak
programme.desc: Sebuah program travelog yang menampilkan tiga pelawak popular iaitu Syuk, Sharif Zero, dan Mamak Puteh di mana mereka akan mengembara ke luar negara.

programme.title: Semmaiyaana Saapadu
programme.desc: A mom and her daughters modernize traditional cooking with healthier versions of beloved recipes, serving up nostalgia with a nutritious twist.

programme.title: Kak Kek Ke Kelate
programme.desc: Join alter ego Catriona Ross as she uncovers the most popular dishes, iconic locations, hidden gems and, as always, the vibrant people on her travels throughout Kelantan.

programme.title: RASA Anak Emak Anak Bapak
programme.desc: Program masakan ini memerlukan selebriti jemputan membawa ibu atau bapa mereka menjelajah Malaysia bagi merasa sendiri masakan kegemaran ibu bapa masing-masing.

programme.title: Garden of Treasure
programme.desc: Buckle up as Darren takes us back on the road in this new season! Join him as he discovers herb gardens filled with treasures across Malaysias farms And markets - and scales the mountains of East Malaysia, searching for the medicinal herbs used by the aboriginal people And local Chinese.

programme.title: The Hot-blooded
programme.desc: 4 friends gave up on Taekwondo and part ways after being asked to lose on purpose in a trial. Years later, they decided to take on a local gang realizing their hometown is threatened.

programme.title: Bear Man
programme.desc: Two bears from the Institute of techonolgy have turned into humans after eating garlic and mugwort. Yet, one has grown up into a police, while one has become a gangster...

programme.title: Honeysweet
programme.desc: Chi-ho is a successful product designer. Il-young works in a loan company. They meet at her company when he try to pay his brothers debt. Coincidence brings them to become closer.

programme.title: The Noisy Mansion
programme.desc: Geo-ul moves into the mysterious apartment plagued by unexplained floor noise. Determined to solve the mystery, she faces unexpected challenges while uncovering the apartments secrets.

programme.title: Hear Me: Our Summer
programme.desc: Yong-jun is working as a delivery man when he meets and instantly falls for Yeo-reum, the devoted sister of a gifted deaf swimmer. Yeo-reum slowly opens her heart to warm-hearted Yong-jun.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A rock climber tries to save the day after a mad scientist releases a toxic gas that leaves thousands stranded in skyscrapers in Seoul district.

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: Citizen of a Kind
programme.desc: Duk-hee receives a call from a bank offering a loan. After sending money for fees, she realizes that was a scam. She receives another call one day. This time, its a plea for help...

programme.title: Big Match
programme.desc: A man framed for murder battles a game planner who is intent on turning a city into one giant game board that he can control.

programme.title: Okay! Madam
programme.desc: A married couple unwittingly become involved in a rescue operation of a hijacked aircraft during their first-ever family trip abroad to Hawaii.

programme.title: Its Okay!
programme.desc: In-young loses her mother in an accident and is kicked out by the landlord. Her chief choreographer has no choice but to bring her home. Facing adversity, the two gradually become closer.

programme.title: Beautiful Vampire
programme.desc: A beautiful 500-year-old vampire has her carefully constructed quiet life put in jeopardy when she becomes attracted to her landladys doltish son.

programme.title: TAEYONG: Ty Track in Cinemas
programme.desc: Taeyong is the first NCT member to make a solo debut. He released a mini album and held a 2-day concert. Witness his outstanding performance and take a closer look at him behind the stage.

programme.title: One Win
programme.desc: Woo-jin is the newly appointed manager of a girls volleyball team which is going to disband. The new owner sold all ace players for money and asked the team to win at least once.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: A North Korean soldier, Kyu-nam, embarks on an escape for a better future, while a State Security officer, Hyun-sang, relentlessly pursues him to protect the present in a deadly chase.

programme.title: Midnight Runners
programme.desc: Two students from Korean National Police University decide to work together and track down a kidnapping incident.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A rock climber tries to save the day after a mad scientist releases a toxic gas that leaves thousands stranded in skyscrapers in Seoul district.

programme.title: Switch
programme.desc: The life of a top star actor was turned upside down when he meets a taxi driver on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat the Devils Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: Veteran
programme.desc: A merciless detective hunts down a young and successful drug addict who always escapes from investigations with the help of his wealth and connections.

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesnt last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: I, the Executioner
programme.desc: Detective Seo Do-Cheol and rookie cop Park Sun-Woo investigate a murder which reveals links to past cases of a serial killer. The killer releases a teaser online and intesifies the chaos.

programme.title: Return of the Mafia
programme.desc: 10 years ago, the mafia family welcomed the entrepreneur Dae-suh as the son-in-law. They set up a company and Dae-Suh becomes the president. The family plot a conspiracy against him...

programme.title: Hidden Face
programme.desc: While Sung-jin is searching for his fiancee Su-yeon, he meets her friend Mi-ju. A breathtaking thriller unfolds in which Su-yeon, who is trapped in a secret room, witnesses a naked truth.

programme.title: Il Mare
programme.desc: A young woman from 1999 and a young man from 1997 begin a parallel-time love story separated by a span of two years when they start to receive each others letters in the mailbox.

programme.title: The Noisy Mansion
programme.desc: Geo-ul moves into the mysterious apartment plagued by unexplained floor noise. Determined to solve the mystery, she faces unexpected challenges while uncovering the apartments secrets.

programme.title: Its Okay!
programme.desc: In-young loses her mother in an accident and is kicked out by the landlord. Her chief choreographer has no choice but to bring her home. Facing adversity, the two gradually become closer.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E36
programme.desc: Roberto confiesa que fue el quien asesino a Gabriel para inculpar a Camila. Camila, llora de alegra, al saberse inocente de esa muerte. Max le reitera su incondicional apoyo ratificndole su gran amor. Ezequiel expresa su intencion de casarse con Camila

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E37
programme.desc: Ezequiel rechazado por Camila, la manipula con una nueva oferta de trabajo como asistente de su hija Julia y todo para tratar de conseguir su cercana. Max, confa en el amor de Camila. Torrealba pide que unan esfuerzos para encontrar a Rosa Blanco.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E55
programme.desc: En presencia de Pastora, Ral, Octavia, Pereto, Manuel Jess, Baudillo, Edilio y Cepeda, Israel y Misael alzan sus armas.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E56
programme.desc: Para desagrado de Pastora y Edilio, Cirilo acepta la oferta de Israel, manejarn juntos el imperio de los Santa Mara.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E55
programme.desc: Gertrudis le expone a Alberto su teora de lo ocurrido: Malena e Isabel planearon la muerte de Pablo para quitarlo del medio, ya que se resista a firmar el divorcio. El momento de la verdad llega; Omar se presenta ante la enfermera y le hace saber que descubrio su secreto: ella era la mujer del sicario que asesino a Marco Aurelio Corona; a Lorena se le viene el mundo encima.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E52
programme.desc: Adriana, en una habitacion de huespedes, es sorprendida por Cristian quien est dispuesto a poseerla.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E53
programme.desc: Debil, Cesar intenta continuar su huida, mientras le ruega a Dios que le de fuerzas.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E54
programme.desc: Intentando zafarse de la locura de Cesar Adriana le pide al joven que se marche pero el hombre le exige que le diga cundo regresar a su lado.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E017
programme.desc: Nicols recibe la llamada que espera de la persona que lo va a ayudar en su venganza contra Hilario. Yosmir le pide dinero prestado a Isaura con la excusa de que es para un negocio, pero Chabeto lo pone en evidencia ante la seora asegurando que la plata es para salir con una novia, Eugenia ve su plan para salir con Yosmir desvanecerse cuando Fernanda le recuerda que tienen un compromiso en el club. Victoria se espanta al descubrir que Nicols tena razon, pues todos los novillos que acaba de comprar Hilario se murieron apenas el hombre cerro el trato. Jons, manipulador, le reprocha a Antonieta que haya dudado de su amor y le muestra las fotos de todos los terrenos que ha pensado en comprar para que construyan su casa una vez que se casen.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E018
programme.desc: Hilario queda sorprendido al enterarse que Victoria ha decidido regresar a la ciudad con Hansen pues, segn ella, debe ir en busca de su verdad. Nicols asegura a Fernanda que avisarle a Victoria lo que iba a pasar con los novillos era parte de su plan para ganarse su confianza. Victoria le pide a Adelaida que le diga si es cierto que Hilario mato a Jaimito Del Casal; la seora asegura a su hija que ella cree en la inocencia de su esposo aunque Fernanda no comparta su opinion y la insta a decidir si va a creer o no en su padre. Clementina aconseja a Victoria que se busque otro enamorado que la ayude a olvidarse de Nicols.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E37
programme.desc: Ezequiel rechazado por Camila, la manipula con una nueva oferta de trabajo como asistente de su hija Julia y todo para tratar de conseguir su cercana. Max, confa en el amor de Camila. Torrealba pide que unan esfuerzos para encontrar a Rosa Blanco.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E38
programme.desc: Ante las intenciones de Ezequiel, Octavia y Marcelina agreden verbalmente a Camila. Max le propone y Camila duda pero accede a casarse con el. En una cena, Ezequiel rene a sus hijos y Camila ser la homenajeada especial.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E56
programme.desc: Para desagrado de Pastora y Edilio, Cirilo acepta la oferta de Israel, manejarn juntos el imperio de los Santa Mara.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E57
programme.desc: En una mezcla de disfrute y dolor, Pastora comprueba que el cadver de Cirilo reposa en la morgue.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E56
programme.desc: Omar cree que Lorena se infiltro en casa de los Corona para dar informacion al sicario. Ante el Juez Montilla, Isabel admite haber matado a su hermano - Claudio y Lorena van de salida cuando son sorprendidos por Omar, quien viene acompaado de dos policas; el Comisario, muy a su pesar, le informa a Lorena que est detenida.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E57
programme.desc: Omar va a proceder al arresto de Lorena, pero Claudio interviene. En el apartamento de Isabel, Patricia exige que las mujeres le digan toda la verdad de lo que paso; tanto Malena como Isabel mantienen la version acordada; la abogada piensa que algo le ocultan- Gertrudis, festiva, gloriosa, le informa a Norma que pronto se casar con Claudio - Paulina pone a Don Lucio al tanto de lo que est ocurriendo con Virginia.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E53
programme.desc: Debil, Cesar intenta continuar su huida, mientras le ruega a Dios que le de fuerzas.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E54
programme.desc: Intentando zafarse de la locura de Cesar Adriana le pide al joven que se marche pero el hombre le exige que le diga cundo regresar a su lado.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E017
programme.desc: Nicols recibe la llamada que espera de la persona que lo va a ayudar en su venganza contra Hilario. Yosmir le pide dinero prestado a Isaura con la excusa de que es para un negocio, pero Chabeto lo pone en evidencia ante la seora asegurando que la plata es para salir con una novia, Eugenia ve su plan para salir con Yosmir desvanecerse cuando Fernanda le recuerda que tienen un compromiso en el club. Victoria se espanta al descubrir que Nicols tena razon, pues todos los novillos que acaba de comprar Hilario se murieron apenas el hombre cerro el trato. Jons, manipulador, le reprocha a Antonieta que haya dudado de su amor y le muestra las fotos de todos los terrenos que ha pensado en comprar para que construyan su casa una vez que se casen.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E018
programme.desc: Hilario queda sorprendido al enterarse que Victoria ha decidido regresar a la ciudad con Hansen pues, segn ella, debe ir en busca de su verdad. Nicols asegura a Fernanda que avisarle a Victoria lo que iba a pasar con los novillos era parte de su plan para ganarse su confianza. Victoria le pide a Adelaida que le diga si es cierto que Hilario mato a Jaimito Del Casal; la seora asegura a su hija que ella cree en la inocencia de su esposo aunque Fernanda no comparta su opinion y la insta a decidir si va a creer o no en su padre. Clementina aconseja a Victoria que se busque otro enamorado que la ayude a olvidarse de Nicols.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E37
programme.desc: Ezequiel rechazado por Camila, la manipula con una nueva oferta de trabajo como asistente de su hija Julia y todo para tratar de conseguir su cercana. Max, confa en el amor de Camila. Torrealba pide que unan esfuerzos para encontrar a Rosa Blanco.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E38
programme.desc: Ante las intenciones de Ezequiel, Octavia y Marcelina agreden verbalmente a Camila. Max le propone y Camila duda pero accede a casarse con el. En una cena, Ezequiel rene a sus hijos y Camila ser la homenajeada especial.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E56
programme.desc: Para desagrado de Pastora y Edilio, Cirilo acepta la oferta de Israel, manejarn juntos el imperio de los Santa Mara.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E57
programme.desc: En una mezcla de disfrute y dolor, Pastora comprueba que el cadver de Cirilo reposa en la morgue.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E56
programme.desc: Omar cree que Lorena se infiltro en casa de los Corona para dar informacion al sicario. Ante el Juez Montilla, Isabel admite haber matado a su hermano - Claudio y Lorena van de salida cuando son sorprendidos por Omar, quien viene acompaado de dos policas; el Comisario, muy a su pesar, le informa a Lorena que est detenida.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E57
programme.desc: Omar va a proceder al arresto de Lorena, pero Claudio interviene. En el apartamento de Isabel, Patricia exige que las mujeres le digan toda la verdad de lo que paso; tanto Malena como Isabel mantienen la version acordada; la abogada piensa que algo le ocultan- Gertrudis, festiva, gloriosa, le informa a Norma que pronto se casar con Claudio - Paulina pone a Don Lucio al tanto de lo que est ocurriendo con Virginia.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E53
programme.desc: Debil, Cesar intenta continuar su huida, mientras le ruega a Dios que le de fuerzas.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E55
programme.desc: Despues de conversar con Carlos Ral, Adriana llega deshecha a su casa cuando es sorprendida por Cristian, quien saca un revolver y la amenaza para que se vaya con el.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E018
programme.desc: Hilario queda sorprendido al enterarse que Victoria ha decidido regresar a la ciudad con Hansen pues, segn ella, debe ir en busca de su verdad. programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E019
programme.desc: Fernanda impide que Nicols siga espiando la conversacion entre Jons y Builder. Una emocionada Antonieta comenta con Fernanda que existe la posibilidad de salir en la pelcula que va a filmar Jack aunque sea como extra, cosa que la hace muy feliz, pues todas sus amigas de la alta sociedad se van a morir de envidia.Victoria se finge furiosa ante Adelaida al recibir un ramo de flores que le enva Nicols, aunque, a solas, admite que se muere por perdonarlo.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E58
programme.desc: Lara Portillo dispone comprar unas pruebas de ADN que digan que la joven no lleva en sus venas la sangre de ninguno de los Santa Mara.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E57
programme.desc: Omar va a proceder al arresto de Lorena, pero Claudio interviene. programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E58
programme.desc: Pedro, seguro de que Lorena fue su delatora, enva a dos de sus sicarios a hacerse cargo de la enfermera - Lorena va rumbo a la universidad, cuando una camioneta frena violentamente delante de ella y se bajan Quique y Emilio, los secuaces de Pedro, con el rostro cubierto con unos pasamontaas; con pericia someten a la joven y luego se pierden a toda velocidad. Lorena ha sido secuestrada.

programme.title: Backcountry Rescue - S01:E03 - Married to the Job
programme.desc: Jake y Marilynn cancelan una cena para poder atender a un esquiador herido en Teton Pass.

programme.title: Backcountry Rescue - S01:E04 - Juggled Lives
programme.desc: La ajetreada agenda del Dr. AJ Wheeler le mantiene fuera de combate, pero su equipo lucha contra los fuertes vientos en el helicoptero para salvar a un conductor de motos de nieve con el femur roto. Luego recibe otra llamada y el Dr. Wheeler est all, intentando rescatar a un hombre que cae por un acantilado de 60 metros.

programme.title: Gold Fever - S21:E05 - Prospectors
programme.desc: Tom y Kael Massie buscan indicios de oro, desde la recogida de muestras en antiguas minas hasta el senderismo por las montaas con detectores de metales.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S01:E08 - Secret Trade
programme.desc: Ivan Carter investiga el infame negocio de la caza furtiva en frica.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E24 - The Queen Her True Story
Carters W.A.R. - S02:E07 - Sold into Slavery
programme.desc: Ivan est investigando el comercio ilegal de carne de caza en Kinshasa, cuando se topa con tres cras de chimpance cautivas que se venden en el mercado negro. Se planea un dramtico rescate en el que los chimpances son entregados sanos y salvos a un lugar dedicado a proporcionar un futuro mejor a todos los primates de frica.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S02:E04 - The Rock Quarry
programme.desc: Explorando una mina inundada y abandonada por la noche, Manny Puig busca depredadores mientras intenta comprender este mundo aislado y salvaje.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S02:E05 - Primal River
programme.desc: Manny explora un ro primitivo en busca de encuentros peligrosos y no queda decepcionado.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S02:E06 - Snakebite!
programme.desc: Manny es gravemente mordido por una gran serpiente de cascabel de diamante del oeste, mientras que la grabacion de un episodio de Salvaje Salvaje en el sur de Texas.

programme.title: Savage Wild - S02:E07 - Black Bear Encounter
programme.desc: Manny Puig experimenta espeluznantes encuentros en plena noche con enormes osos negros de Florida. En Florida, los animales de los bosques del norte se encuentran cara a cara con los de los tropicos, y los osos de aqu se enfrentan a ellos.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S01:E01 - Alpine Ghosts
programme.desc: Mario takes on the unforgiving alpine mountains of the south island of New Zealand in a fallow deer hunt with his bow, and cooks an impressive venison pie dish.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S01:E02 - Deadly Outback
programme.desc: In the outback of Australia where everything is trying to kill you. Its monsoon season when no one attempts to roam around with salt water crocodiles lurking. Mario links up with a long time friend in search of a wild Buffalo.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S01:E03 - Up with the Gods - Himalayan Tahr
programme.desc: Mario teams up with good friend and precision rifle expert Bernard and heads into the high alpine mountains above New Zealands rugged West Coast. Drawing on his Greek roots, Mario cooks a rustic Kleftiko dish in an earth oven.

programme.title: Man Eats Wild - S01:E04 - Outback Odyssey
programme.desc: In one of the harshest environments on the planet, Mario travels to the outback desert of Australia in search of feral camels that have been running rampant. What seemingly feels to be a a simple task quickly turns into one of the hardest and most unexpected challenges he has taken on. With a bow in hand and scorching heat he explores the great dividing range, in hope of harvesting one of these middle eastern based beasts.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S05:E09 - Trapping Part 2
programme.desc: La caza con trampas en invierno requiere habilidades diferentes a las de la caza con trampas en primavera. Laramy saca todos los trucos para atrapar bichos.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S05:E10 - Idaho Deer
programme.desc: Laramy caza la cola blanca de montaa en las empinadas subidas de Idaho. Cazar estas montaas a la antigua usanza supone un tremendo desafo.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S05:E11 - Hide and Tanning Show
programme.desc: Un verdadero hombre de campo utiliza cada parte de la presa, y Laramy nos muestra por que el desollado y curtido es una parte tan importante de la vida del hombre de montaa.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S05:E12 - The Hunt of a Mountain Man 2
programme.desc: Laramy nos muestra como cazaban a mediados del siglo XIX los Hombres de la Montaa, que necesitaban habilidades y tecnicas de acecho poco comunes para sobrevivir durante el invierno. Los duros inviernos eran conocidos como la Muerte Blanca por los Hombres de las Montaas.

programme.title: Carters W.A.R. - S02:E07 - Sold into Slavery
programme.desc: Ivan est investigando el comercio ilegal de carne de caza en Kinshasa, cuando se topa con tres cras de chimpance cautivas que se venden en el mercado negro. Se planea un dramtico rescate en el que los chimpances son entregados sanos y salvos a un lugar dedicado a proporcionar un futuro mejor a todos los primates de frica.
